comments.body: FYI I think you can just declare this function: `cdef accessor get_accessor_func(int code) except -1:` and then an exception occuring int the cdef'd function will propogate up the stack

can you write a vbench for localization? there are quite a lot of API calls here. Some of these functions are exposed in numpy's C API, which might be worth investigating down the line for potential speed ups.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1704,1708 @@            
           
    if infer_dst:
        dst_hours = np.empty(n, dtype=np.int64)
        dst_hours.fill(NPY_NAT)
